dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fw: copyright breach - urgent
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 03, 2004 10:48 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Fw: copyright breach - urgent

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Neil  Doyle <nd@neildoyle.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, December 3, 2004, 6:04:11 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Fw: copyright breach - urgent

===8<==============Original message text===============
- ----- Original Message -----
From: Neil Doyle
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 2004 5:50 PM
Subject: copyright breach - urgent


Dear Sirs - please be advised that one of your customers,
http://www.investigateislam.com, has stolen a section from my website
(http://www.neildoyle.com/vault.html).

The copied page is here:
http://www.investigateislam.com/jihad%20watch.htm

The operator is also linking to individual files from this page and stealing
bandwidth from my media server at www.johnathangaltfilms.com

I have sent an email to webmaster@investigateislam.com asking them to
rectify this, but I have received no response. The whois domain name
registration and email contact details appear to be false.

They have included my web-stat counter, which is putting me in breach of
web-stat.com's 'one site only' agreement.

This represents a serious breach of my copyright and I would ask that you
ensure that the page in question is either deleted or amended within 24
hours.

Yours faithfully,

Neil Doyle

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBsJjFvK/XpJs6oyURAgKIAJ0b4m9dVX8W9bzHLjGsc1jDfiXySwCgn4yL
J9erqrfHmNIrGJGtN56u0s0=
=IA3/
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
